title: Judgement Day
overview: Judgement Day is a ZEE5 Original series starring Sohini Sarkar, Madhumita Sarcar, Abhishek Singh and Arpan Ghoshal. The story revolves around two sisters from North Bengal, Diya and Hiya. During her visit to Kolkata, Hiya gets raped and her advocate sister Diya takes it upon herself to punish the culprits.
